{mlr3spatiotempcv} is now on CRAN. 

It adds spatiotemporal resampling methods to the #mlr3 machine learning framework in #rstats.

See the documentation at https://t.co/eArUgaXMXO and the mlr3book chapter (https://t.co/SPTjsUkqJj) for details. https://t.co/FMTBjnDaNi
